charges.charge_description: Receipt and distribution of child Pornography  Penalty: Mandatory Minimum of 5 Yrs, Maximum of 20 Yrs, $250,000.00 Fine; $100 CVF; Not More Than 3 Yrs TSR.(1)
Receipt and distribution of child Pornography  Penalty: Mandatory Minimum of 5 Yrs, Maximum of 20 Yrs, $250,000.00 Fine; $100 CVF; Not More Than 3 Yrs TSR.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 90 mos to serve; 10 yrs tsr, usual terms apply; $100 cvf; $1,000 fine at $50 mthly to begin 60 days from release; register w/sex offender agency; cannot view or possess any video of children; cannot prescribe to any internet service while on tsr; no employement with anyone under 18 yrs of age; mental health or sex offender program; as to placement, courts leaves those recommendations to BOP; waived appeal. Plea Agreement unsealed. Deft pled not true to violations 1 thru 6; court finds sufficient evidence tat deft has violated all 6 violations; Modified: continue under the same terms and conditions as previously imposed to include celph stmts must be provided to USPO. Pled not true to allegations 1,2,3; Court finds sufficient evidence that deft has violated srt, Revoked: 6 mos concurrent to all 3 allegations, consecutive to 18 mos in case 5:18cr33 for a total of 24 mos; srt terminated; advised of right to appeal
